sense.name: The institution and conduct of legal proceedings against a defendant for criminal behavior.
sense.examples: The prosecution of Ted Bundy was an emotional event. Prosecution will begin tomorrow. Prosecution is an important part of criminal justice.

sense.name: The lawyers acting for the state to put the case against the defendant.
sense.examples: The prosecution will present its case tomorrow. The defense is pitted against the prosecution in court.

sense.name: The continuance of something begun with a view of its completion.
sense.examples: We are encouraged in the prosecution of our task. She is hopeful in the prosecution of her work.
